titles.title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for official travel after Election Day of members of Congress who will not serve as members during the next Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 07/25/1997--Introduced. Prohibits Federal reimbursement or payment for travel and related expenses incurred during the post-election period by any Member of Congress who will not serve in the succeeding Congress. Excludes travel of a Member: (1) within the district or State the Member represents; (2) between such district or State and the Washington, D.C. Metropolitan Area; or (3) within the Washington, D.C. Metropolitan Area.
